channel.title: Pipelines on Jenkins and Me
channel.description: Recent content in Pipelines on Jenkins and Me

item.title: Pipline
item.description:
Pipeline as the Code

Official Links

  • https://jenkins.io/doc/pipeline/
  • https://github.com/jenkinsci/pipeline-plugin/blob/master/TUTORIAL.md
  • https://github.com/jenkinsci/pipeline-examples/tree/master/pipeline-examples
  • https://github.com/jenkinsci/pipeline-plugin/blob/master/COMPATIBILITY.md
  • https://documentation.cloudbees.com/docs/cookbook/pipeline-as-code.html
  • https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/2.0+Pipeline+as+Code
  • https://documentation.cloudbees.com/docs/cookbook/_setting_up_a_basic_build_pipeline_with_jenkins.html
  • http://stackoverflow.com/tags/jenkins-pipeline/hot?filter=year
  • https://github.com/jenkinsci/workflow-cps-global-lib-plugin/blob/master/README.md

FAQ

nodeブロックの外でもGroovy Scriptをloadしたい

まだ本家が対応できていない

ref: https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-32400

Jenkinsfile(pipeline code)をテストしたい

https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-33925

Travis CIみたいに各BranchのJenkinsfileを見てビルドしたい

https://github.com/jenkinsci/pipeline-plugin/blob/master/TUTORIAL.md#creating-multibranch-projects
